title: Gifted Education Professional Development Program: Blended Learning-Based Language Education Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary education experience and understanding of gifted education core concepts
context.additional_context: Course for in-service secondary teachers to acquire and apply blended learning strategies for gifted students' language development. Applies project-based assessments to actual lesson design

learning_goals: Learners design and implement personalized language education strategies for gifted students in blended learning environments
Learners develop interaction and feedback mechanisms utilizing synchronous/asynchronous online activities
Through project-based assessment, learners produce language education materials applicable to real educational settings
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
